channel.title: Help With JDK
channel.description:
help please, when i compile it says this: [img]http://mopar 1.jpg[/img]
idk if i did that image right, ive never done it, and my preview doesnt work :( if the image isnt showing than it says this: [i]you do not have Java installed, please download it from the sie that is about to load.[/i]
but i have already downloaded it......?!?!?!?!?!?!?!? soooo help please???

item.title: Help With JDK
item.dc:creator: @draggon67 draggon67
item.description:
@draggon67 wrote:

kk thanks, but now it says ‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
any more advice?

oh and sorry, but the environmental variable deal really is confusing and i dont understand it

Read full topic

item.title: Help With JDK
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Set you environmental variables instead and use this compiler: @echo off javac *.java pause

Google on how to set your java environmental variables.

Read full topic
